Get the discussion and other details for a particular topic

Source: R/get_discussions.R
get_topic_discussions.Rd

Get the discussion and other details for a particular topic

get_topic_discussions(link)

Arguments

link

URL for topic discussion

Value

A tibble containing the topic question

Examples

links <- get_theme_topics(link = get_themes()$links[4])
#> New names:
#> * `` -> ...1
get_topic_discussions(link = links$Link[1])
#> # A tibble: 12 x 10
#>    theme  topic   user    userCode job     role  date_time type  code  post     
#>    <chr>  <chr>   <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr> <chr>     <chr> <chr> <chr>
